summary: Y-Store V2.0 Roadmap Testing Complete - Guest Checkout, Google Auth, Catalog APIs

integration_issues.issue: Some direct routes (/products, /checkout) return 404, but header navigation works

passed_tests: V2 Guest Auth Create - guest session API returns guest_token and guest_id
V2 Guest Auth Get - retrieves guest session data correctly
V2 Auth Me (Unauth) - correctly returns 401 without session
Products API - returns exactly 43 products as expected
Categories API - returns exactly 10 categories as expected
Health Check API - backend connectivity working
Frontend homepage loads with Y-Store Ukrainian branding
Login page accessible via header navigation
Google login button present on login page ('Увійти через Google')
Email/password login form complete and functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend routing: Direct navigation to /products and /checkout returns 404, but header navigation works. May need React Router configuration update.
